title: UK finalizes regulatory approach to crypto, stablecoins
description:
The U.K. Treasury has finalized its regulatory approach to the crypto industry, which will be enacted in multiple phases, with the first phase bringing fiat-backed stablecoins under the supervision of financial watchdogs. In a policy update released on Oct. 30, the Treasury outlined its strategy to regulate stablecoins, with an initial focus on fiat-backed stablecoins […]

The post UK finalizes regulatory approach to crypto, stablecoins appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Bitcoin’s Black Swan — A Retrospective on 2020’s ‘Black Thursday’
description: Almost four years have elapsed since the market crash of March 11, 2020, widely known as “Black Thursday.” During that turbulent period, the value of bitcoin plummeted by more than 50% in a 24-hour span, reaching $3,867 per unit. This ominous date, etched indelibly in financial history, is synonymous with a “black swan” event, characterized […]

title: Government Announces £100 Million Investment in AI for Life Sciences and Healthcare
description: In a significant move to revolutionize the field of life sciences and healthcare, the UK government has unveiled a groundbreaking initiative that harnesses the power of Artificial Intelligence (AI). This £100 million investment, known as the AI Life Sciences Accelerator Mission, aims to leverage the UK’s expertise in secure health data and cutting-edge AI technology ... Read more

title: Animoca Brands inks partnership with NEOM to push Web3 development
description: In a significant stride toward advancing the Web3 landscape, Animoca Brands, a well-established developer specializing in Web3 gaming, has formed a strategic partnership with the NEOM Investment Fund of Saudi Arabia. This partnership, announced on October 30, seeks to invigorate the development of Web3 technologies within the region. Animoca Brands will work closely with NEOM ... Read more

title: Phantom unveils new camera NFT feature
description: Phantom’s Camera Mint feature introduces a tool for creating NFTs directly on mobile devices, presenting both opportunities and challenges in the evolving landscape of digital collectibles.

title: Elon Musk’s vision: turning X into an all-in-one financial hub
description: The direction of X is set to change, with plans to intertwine its social media capabilities with financial tools. Get insights into this transition.

title: Groundbreaking Research Paper Uncovers XRP’s Fair Market Value, Projections Range from $9.81 to $513,000 – Unveiling Its Enormous Wealth Potential
description: Valhill Capital has unveiled 6 different models for estimating XRP’s price. The estimated XRP price projection ranges from $9.81 to $513,000. title: Dogecoin Poised for Fresh Uptrend, DOGE Technical Indicator Signals 13% Rally for DOGE
description: DOGE has recently broken free from a multi-year descending triangle and the TD Sequential indicator has confirmed a buying opportunity on the weekly chart. title: Solana, RNDR, OP, LBR Tokens on Analyst’s Watchlist for Week Ahead
description:
